import React, { useEffect } from 'react' import { HeartOutlined } from '@ant-design/icons' const DogCard = ({ dog, keepTheDog }) => { const { img, breed, subbreed, liked } = dog const handleAddDog = e => { e.preventDefault() const myDogs = JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('dogs')) localStorage.setItem('dogs', JSON.stringify([...myDogs, dog])) // keepTheDog(img) } const likedOrNot = !!liked ? 'deeppink' : '' return (
keep
{breed}
{subbreed}
) } export default DogCard
